creator: dictoon@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 35039
Java repro case

When using the XSLF API, text containing newlines (\n) and wrapping at the right edge of a textbox overflows the textbox. I've also tested with \r instead of \n and the problem remains.

Please find attached to this bug a small, standalone repro case that uses the default font, font size and style, and sticks to Latin left-to-right text.

Created attachment 35040
PowerPoint file generated by repro case
creator: dictoon@gmail.com
